verses.verse: לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> how long יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah תַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> Why standest בְּרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> thou afar off תַּ֝עְלִ֗ים <S%H5956><s%> hide לְעִתּ֥וֹת <S%H6256><s%> thou [thyself] in times בַּצָּרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> adversary

בְּגַאֲוַ֣ת <S%H1346><s%> in [his] pride רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked יִדְלַ֣ק <S%H1814><s%> doth persecute עָנִ֑י <S%H6041><s%> the poor יִתָּפְשׂ֓וּ ׀ <S%H8610><s%> let them be taken בִּמְזִמּ֖וֹת <S%H4209><s%> in the devices ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> that חָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H2803><s%> they have imagined

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> boasteth רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> For the wicked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> desire נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> of his heart's וּבֹצֵ֥עַ <S%H1214><s%> the covetous בֵּ֝רֵ֗ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blesseth נִ֘אֵ֥ץ ׀ <S%H5006><s%> abhorreth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [whom] the LORD

רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked כְּגֹ֣בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> through the pride אַ֭פּוֹ <S%H639><s%> of his countenance בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> does not יִדְרֹ֑שׁ <S%H1875><s%> will not seek אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> are There אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> [after God] God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְזִמּוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4209><s%> [is] not in all his thoughts

יָ֘חִ֤ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> grievous [דָרְכּו כ] (דְרָכָ֨יו <S%H1870><s%> along ק) בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> are always מָר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [are] far above מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments מִנֶּגְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5048><s%> of his sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all צ֝וֹרְרָ֗יו <S%H6887><s%> out of his sight [as for] all his enemies יָפִ֥יחַ <S%H6315><s%> he puffeth בָּהֶֽם׃

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> He hath said בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest אֶמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> I shall not be moved לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> generations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not be in בְרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> [be] in adversity

אָלָ֤ה <S%H423><s%> of cursing פִּ֣יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> His mouth מָ֭לֵא <S%H4390><s%> is full וּמִרְמ֣וֹת <S%H4820><s%> and deceit וָתֹ֑ךְ <S%H8496><s%> and fraud תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under לְ֝שׁוֹנ֗וֹ <S%H3956><s%> under his tongue עָמָ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> [is] mischief וָאָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> and vanity

יֵשֵׁ֤ב ׀ <S%H3427><s%> He sitteth בְּמַאְרַ֬ב <S%H3993><s%> in the lurking places חֲצֵרִ֗ים <S%H2691><s%> of the villages בַּֽ֭מִּסְתָּרִים <S%H4565><s%> in the secret places יַהֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> doth he murder נָקִ֑י <S%H5355><s%> the innocent עֵ֝ינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes לְֽחֵלְכָ֥ה <S%H2489><s%> against the poor יִצְפֹּֽנוּ׃ <S%H6845><s%> are privily set

יֶאֱרֹ֬ב <S%H693><s%> He lieth in wait בַּמִּסְתָּ֨ר ׀ <S%H4565><s%> secretly כְּאַרְיֵ֬ה <S%H738><s%> as a lion בְסֻכֹּ֗ה <S%H5520><s%> in his den יֶ֭אֱרֹב <S%H693><s%> he lieth in wait לַחֲט֣וֹף <S%H2414><s%> to catch עָנִ֑י <S%H6041><s%> the poor יַחְטֹ֥ף <S%H2414><s%> he doth catch עָ֝נִ֗י <S%H6041><s%> the poor בְּמָשְׁכ֥וֹ <S%H4900><s%> when he draweth בְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7568><s%> him into his net

[וַדָּכַה כ] (יִדְכֶּ֥ה <S%H1794><s%> break ק) יָשֹׁ֑חַ <S%H7817><s%> [and] humbleth וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> may fall בַּ֝עֲצוּמָ֗יו <S%H6099><s%> by his strong ones [חֶלְכָּאִים כ] (חֵ֣יל ק) (כָּאִֽים׃ <S%H2489><s%> poor ק)

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> He hath said בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart שָׁ֣כַֽח <S%H7911><s%> hath forgotten אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God הִסְתִּ֥יר <S%H5641><s%> he hideth פָּ֝נָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> his face בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest רָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> see לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> he will never

קוּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> O God נְשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> lift up יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> forget [עֲנִיִּים כ] (עֲנָוִֽים׃ <S%H6041><s%> afflicted ק)

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> how long נִאֵ֖ץ <S%H5006><s%> contemn רָשָׁ֥ע ׀ <S%H7563><s%> Wherefore doth the wicked אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> angels אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> answer בְּ֝לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תִּדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> Thou wilt not require

רָאִ֡תָה <S%H7200><s%> Thou hast seen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> you עָ֘מָ֤ל <S%H5999><s%> mischief וָכַ֨עַס ׀ <S%H3708><s%> and spite תַּבִּיט֮ <S%H5027><s%> [it] for thou beholdest לָתֵ֪ת <S%H5414><s%> to requite בְּיָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <S%H3027><s%> [it] with thy hand עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> and יַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> committeth חֵלֶ֑כָה <S%H2489><s%> the poor יָ֝ת֗וֹם <S%H3490><s%> of the fatherless אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> You הָיִ֬יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been עוֹזֵֽר׃ <S%H5826><s%> himself unto thee thou art the helper

שְׁ֭בֹר <S%H7665><s%> Break זְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> thou the arm רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וָ֝רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> and the evil תִּֽדְרוֹשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> [man] seek out רִשְׁע֥וֹ <S%H7562><s%> his wickedness בַל־ <S%H1077><s%> none תִּמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> [till] thou find

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [is] King עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> and ever אָבְד֥וּ <S%H6><s%> are perished ג֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen מֵֽאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of his land

תַּאֲוַ֬ת <S%H8378><s%> the desire עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> of the humble שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> thou hast heard יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD תָּכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> thou wilt prepare לִ֝בָּ֗ם <S%H3820><s%> their heart תַּקְשִׁ֥יב <S%H7181><s%> to hear אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H241><s%> thou wilt cause thine ear

לִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> To judge יָת֗וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וָ֫דָ֥ךְ <S%H1790><s%> and the oppressed בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> will no יוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> may no more ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לַעֲרֹ֥ץ <S%H6206><s%> oppress אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> he מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> is of הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
